SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* from ( SELECT EMPID, PASSWD, PHONE, EMAIL, to_char(hiredate,'yyyy/mm/dd') HIREDATE, ENAME, SECTION FROM EMP WHERE EMPID IS NOT NULL
and ( EMPID LIKE '%$ktext$%' OR ENAME LIKE '%$ktext$%' OR PHONE LIKE '%$ktext$%' OR SECTION LIKE '%$ktext$%' )
ORDER BY HIREDATE DESC) a )b
